title: Angular Validator Options Schema
description: Generates a new, generic form control Validator definition in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new Validator.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the Validator?

spec.description: When true (the default), generates a  "spec.ts" test file for the new Validator.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

path.description: The path at which to create the interface that defines the Validator, relative to the current workspace.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the Validator.
